review:
童年是什么？
童年是一段充满幻想和好奇的时光，是一个人生命中最纯真、最无忧无虑的阶段。它是宁静的夜晚里，瓶中那一只只玲珑的萤火虫发出微弱的光芒1；是游乐场里旋转木马上起伏的欢笑声，在脑海里编织着可口的梦；是试卷上惊鸿的100分，让我欢快地哼歌曲，在夕阳心下时像蝴蝶一样飞回家；也是作文本上潦草的字迹，以及那稚嫩的语句，代表着儿时那颗懵懂的心。童年，就是我们人生的第一课，教会了我们如何去感受世界，如何去理解爱，如何去探索未知。

review: 当我在抖音上刷到的第一时间就来steam买了，截止评论这个时间点不看任何攻略包括奖励关卡，普通关卡全隐藏已经全部通关了（虽说奖励关卡只找到一个隐藏的其他看了攻略也死活找不到不知道是自己菜还是本来就没有）客观评价非常好玩。虽说是一个很多年前的小游戏，但有些关卡不缺乏挑战性，有的关卡为了追求三星和隐藏也死磕了能有一个多小时，有些老外发的帖子也都是分享他们卡关的情况。怎么说呢，算是给童年4399小游戏送小羊回家的回忆补了正版的票吧，人是长大了，但曾经在4399用半小时通全关的小孩现在需要用三天下班后回家的空闲时间才能完成游戏；有些曾经一口气能丝滑切换小羊跳过去的箱子现在只能不停的重开游戏才能避免失误，人长大了，追求完美了，但是也变得畏手畏脚，好歹是过关了，希望屏幕前读到这条评论的你在为童年补票时，也可以重新找回童年玩游戏时的乐趣，也不要丢掉童年时对游戏的热忱。愿所有玩家都不要忘记童年，它永远在回忆里有一席之地。

Я сначала думал что эта какая та новая часть игры, но оказалось нет, это сборник браузерных игр про барашка Шона с бонусными уровнями, это очень круто.
Жаль что поменяли управление, было намного проще переключаться через мышку, просто нажимая на персонажей, или на иконки персонажей сверху, та даже можно было просто нажимать на цифры 1 2 3. Кстати переместили иконки баранов, было так: толстяк Шон и Тимми, а тут Шон Тимми и толстяк, там было проще выбирать ибо средний персонаж был по середине и у нас был выбор на право или на лево, думаете что я чекнулся из за того что обижаюсь на такое изменение, но нет это сильно путает и раздражает.
А ну и ещё бонусные предметы поменяли, раньше были носки и трусы, а сейчас кексики и джойстик атари.
Цена очень вкусная (если по скидке), советую.

review:
[h2] 非常有趣的一款休闲解密游戏，出自经典IP小羊肖恩，美术和音乐都很精美。游戏打折后补票入手的，现已全成就通关。 [/h2]

[u] 目前游戏仍存在的一些小问题： [/u]

1.[b] 部分成就无法达成的Bug。 [/b]我在通关游戏后，第一时间确认游戏的成就进度，发现只剩下一个名为“A Sock For Every Hoof ”的成就无法完成，后来在游戏的讨论区和指南的评论区里，发现很多玩家也无法达成部分成就。但是我后续在讨论区发现了一个方法来解决问题，并达成全成就。[b] 我会把该讨论的链接放在评测底部，希望可以帮到出现一样问题的玩家，同时也希望游戏能后续修复一下。 [/b]

2.[b] 对于PC端用户并不太友好。 [/b]因为大部分操作提示都是手柄的，我已经在评测区看到好多网友，以为这款游戏只能用手柄操作，而给出不推荐。其实游戏是可以用键盘操作的，如果你是单人游玩，选择游戏模式后，按Enter选定1P玩家，之后切换AD键来选择角色，之后再按Enter选定角色，再按S和Enter确认，就能进入游戏，正常单人键鼠游玩了。

3.[b] 角色切换问题。 [/b]游戏核心玩法就是利用角色们不同的优势来达成通关条件，但是不知道为什么，该版本只有在玩家切换角色时，才会显现出角色UI，特别影响玩家的操作判断。后续我去查阅了一下其他版本，果然和我印象中一样，其他版本的角色UI，都会固定显示在屏幕上。

[b] 成就Bug的讨论链接 [/b][i] （具体解决办法在#11，如果成功解决问题，记得感谢一下TA）： [/i]
https://steamcommunity.com/app/259810/discussions/0/1693843461197311983/

总之呢，还是不建议原价入，等打折，游戏配置要求不高，占用也不大，可以无聊的时候打开玩玩，我觉得买这游戏更多的是为了给自己的童年留个完美的答复，也许吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197987209980', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1687902623}
review:
Alright, I usually try to keep my reviews light by only covering games that I enjoy, and often do something interesting or really well, but sometimes a game comes along and I agree to cover it because it looks great, and once I've started playing it the diapointment is so overwhelming that I have to cover it anyway. And so it is with Shawn the Sheep  Home Sheep Home: Farmmageddon Party Edition! The name says it all, since it says so much already, but I love Shawn the Sheep, and I love Party games, so I got the game installed and called over the guys... OK, just Philip, but we got all set to play it, and the problems started to show....

And speaking of the show, if you haven't seen Shawn the Sheep, go watch the entire show right now... I'll wait... It's good isn't it. Not for everybody, but the British slapstik humor is as solid as that one fat sheep! So you'd expect a STS based party game to be witty and full of mischief but...

First off when we clicked on the "Play" button in steam it gave us and error and refused to load. Not a good sign, but I'm a gamer from the old school so a quick poke about tin the games files and we had it running. Then the home screen showed a different title for the game, but that does happen some times when games get DLC and addons. Kind of like when you plan to go to the store for eggs and milk, and then remember you need to visit Gamestop to spend your monthly $5 coupon, and end up buying too much game stuff so you need to get a third job to pay for all the games you don't have time to play now... I love me some good DLC's. 

But then we tried finding the co-op/competitive mode! ANd couldn't find it anywhere! Oh, so maybe we have to play some of the base game to unlock the other modes! SURE SURE, so we played the base game! And it is a perfectly serviceable puzzler where you take control of 1 of three sheep at a time and use their special skills and sizes to get them all to the end. Through the farm and over london and off into outer space! Again, it makes more sense if you've seen the show.

Now let's understand, when I say perfectly serviceable I mean that you can play it and it works and it's even enjoyable. I do not mean that it is great or notable! IT feels exactly like what it is. A java based mobile game ported over to Steam. The hotboxes are rigid, but predictable and reliable. The controls are slow but you can learn them, and the levels are quite complex at higher levels. The speed that you need to go to get stars on each level is ridiculous, and nigh on speed-run levels, but you can unlock the next level without them.

But here's the real problems. even after playing and unlocking all three of the zones of levels, we still could not find the PARTY MODE anywhere. And then we found out why. The steam store calls this The Faregeddon party edition, and shows the party edition and charges you for the party edition, but when you download it... it's not the party edition. and NO, there's no DLC that we are missing. It's just the wrong game files that get downloaded from steam! And the error we ran into before getting the game loaded is steam looking for the right files and not finding them! It knows what the files are supposed to be called but can't find them because they are not there.

And I tried to get support to fix it. I made comments on their steam forum and through the intermediary site where streamers get keys, and even them directly, but heard not a peep out of them. They have apparently abandoned the game. The steam page and their own press kit shows the party game being amazing and even a co-op looking version of the base game (Which would be great BTW) with confetti and pizza party and electric volleyball (Do electric sheep dream of volleyball) but none of it get's downloaded when you buy the game. I hate to say it, but I'm gonna say it! it's a cash grab at best a scam at worst! You do get a game, but not they game they are selling! I hate to be the negative Nelly over here but when I see that it's OVERLY POSITIVE on steam yet is NOT living up to that status, AND when the game hasn't been updated in over 4 years, but JUST NOW shows up in key request sites for stereamers to review I have to imagine that either 1. they are supressing any negative reviews and maybe copyrite striking videos that show the game poorly (make sure to like comment and subscribe BTW in case that happens) or 2 they tried to update it and went as far as sending codes to distro sites and updating the steam page, but then died in a platypus stampede before they could publish the update.. or three they have abandoned it halfway through the publishing process!

I hate to think the worst of people, but what else am I supposed to think? Devs! Please contact me and let me know you've updated it or how to download the full party edition or what magic I have to do to get it to work, and I'll gladly change my review, but until then don't buy this game! You can find it online and play it for free. But do come back next time as we peel the bark of another backlog!

review: 小羊回家——轻松简单的动画体验。我在小学的时候就看过小羊肖恩的动画片，十年过去，我大学了，还在玩小羊肖恩的游戏。很多人第一次接触送小羊回家，可能是在国内的某flash游戏网站上，我也不例外。当时通关了网站上的各个版本，现在发现这个大合集，自己的操作反而不如当初了，只好利用比flash版本多出来的多人功能和自己的朋友通关了游戏。游戏的画风，与我印象中主打3d的动画不同，而是使用了一种比较漫画的手绘风格。在这种风格下，小羊在不同动作时的表情，或者是遇到不同事件时的反应，都十分有趣。游戏的玩法是最简单的2d横向平台跳跃，操控三只小羊到达终点，路上会在隐藏的地方有不同的收集品。三只小羊的三种体型可以应对遇到的不同情况。游戏不同章节的关卡设计也风格明显，游戏存在感极低的剧情则把这些，千奇百怪的关卡融合成了一个自洽的故事。因为游戏面对全年龄，所以难度并不很高，就像是在一种需要稍微动动脑子，动动手的环境中，看完了一整部无厘头的动画片一样，而这同时就是小羊肖恩这类动画的本质，轻松幽默而且简单。

为童年补票的作品，早期在平板上通关过了这个，可惜到现在也好像没有了续作。
非常非常益智的游戏，和小羊一起去地下，英国，外太空旅行？（我在讲什么 半恼）玩家需要操控三只小羊，横版式游玩解密通关。游戏支持1-3名玩家游玩故事模式，如果和朋友一起解密游玩还是很快乐的。还有个多人(2-4人)对战(类似糖豆人淘汰赛那种)。
我依稀记得一代是有吃蛋糕获得金手指的功能的，进pc二代就没有这个了呜呜，蛋糕满收集了也没什么用，蛮可惜的，好喜欢一点就炸的那个金手指。印象最深的大摆钟那关，一代凹了好久才过（额外关卡有），二代简单多啦！
难度的话，看个人吧。之前在平板上游玩的非常流畅，到了键鼠真的就是手忙脚乱了哈哈哈，还不可以改键位！真的是想键鼠玩家脑血栓啊。所有关卡都有提示的。也有看了提示都过不去的关卡！！！只能看攻略视频了。
这个游戏真的是怀旧了，小的时候玩能连续玩几个小时都不觉得腻，现在老了。
游玩时间（通关）4小时内，刷成就大概刷了我三小时呜呜呜呜。部分成就的条件还是非常非常苛刻的，每一关获取满星也真不是一件容易的事，要特别熟练。
益智游戏小羊肖恩值得入手！！！

review:
Home Sheep Home is a browser game I fondly remember on the internet, and at first I didn't know it was based on Shaun the Sheep until I started the game. The gameplay is pretty much simple. Control three sheep; Shirley, Shaun, & Timmy and guide them to a sign with an arrow pointing right to complete the level and advance to the next one. It is a strategy game that requires skill and thinking, and that is pretty much it about this game.

Now with a "Farmageddon Party Edition" of Home Sheep Home on my computer to play, I can revisit the classic levels from the first two browser games, and take a look at a bunch of new levels and even a new multiplayer mode with new minigames for two or more people to play.

Overall, if you enjoyed the Home Sheep Home browser games, then Home Sheep Home: Farmageddon Party Edition is something I would recommend.

review:
Ai lại có thể không biết về bộ phim của ba chú cừu này cơ chứ.
Shirley, Shaun và Timmy trong Shaun the Sheep là cả bầu trời tuổi thơ của tôi cũng như những người đã biết.
Mình không nghĩ rằng Aardman Animations không chỉ sản xuất một trò chơi điện tử mà còn bán nó trên Steam!
Game có đồ họa dễ thương nhất có thể. Ba con cừu khiến mình muốn kéo nó ra màn hình để vuốt ve và ôm chúng.
Game rất dễ làm quen chỉ cần bạn chuyển đổi qua lại giữa ba chú cừu để qua màn. Mỗi con có điểm mạnh riêng nên hãy tận dụng điều đó để qua màn một cách nhanh chóng. Nếu bạn lo về điều đó thì đừng lo vì có ba cấp độ hướng dẫn cho mọi người làm quen.
Điều này làm cho trò chơi trở nên tuyệt vời. Vì cả trẻ em và người lớn đều có thể tận hưởng được nó. Và game có thể Co-op.
10/10

review:
[h1]Приключения барашка Шона и его друзей.[/h1]

Знакомьтесь, перед нами барашек Шон и его друзья: малыш Тимми и верзила Ширли, герои известного английского мультсериала. Да, я знаю, что Шон – овца, но очень трудно отождествлять мужское имя Шон и овцу, поэтому пусть будет баран. И вот, играли они как-то во дворе и внезапно провалились под землю, откуда им и придётся выбираться. В последствии, друзья успеют побывать в Лондоне и даже в космосе.

Игра представляет собой логический платформер, наподобие Lost Vikings, когда каждый персонаж имеет свою особенность и, пользуясь ими, надо пройди уровень до конца. Шон высоко прыгает, Ширли может толкать тяжелые предметы, а Тимми самый маленький и способен пролезть в мелкие щели. На каждом уровне есть своя маленькая фишка, поэтому весьма интересно, что же будет дальше. Уровни полны тайников и коллекционных предметов, которые ещё надо подумать, как достать. За их сбор открываются дополнительные уровни.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=370455104

Нарисована игра очень хорошо. Может быть и без особой детализации, но зато с классным эффектом мультфильма. Выглядит очень приятно. Звучит тоже хорошо, особенно радуют знакомые и забавные звуки, которые издают овечки.

Игра отлично подойдет детям т. к. она совсем не сложная, хотя некоторые уровни заставляют подумать и поэтому родителям тоже можно поиграть. В последнем обновлении добавили мультиплеерные мини игры, но про них ничего сказать не могу – не видел.

review:
轻松！欢乐！
目前只通关了农场迷途。
游戏内音乐十分丰富，画面独具风格。动画中特色的咩咩声以及背景音乐悉数登场！
在游戏里可以练习简单物理。例如，羊在木棍上走，木棍也会跟着移动；蹦床上越弹越高；冲者推东西和走着推东西，东西移动距离不同。
单人模式的关卡难度方面，难度增加地非常均匀。
聚会模式可以同其他玩家在同一台电脑上对抗。一人wasd, 一人方向键。当然，硬要一人分饰2角也能行。但选择人物的界面有4个槽位，不清楚为什么。
还请不要吝惜你的评价，要是还有奖励就更好啦~

review:
Буду честен, я не знал что эта серия игр появилась в steam. И когда я её увидел, мне сразу захотелось её купить, как раз эта игра стоит 250 рублей. Но вот в чем проблема, [spoiler](которая лично моя и моего ноутбука)[/spoiler] в этой игре мой ноут сильно грелся, и вот я не понимаю почему [spoiler](хоть в игре 150 - 160 FPS)[/spoiler]. Но вот в Secrets of Grindea другая ситуация, хоть игра сделана в пиксель - арте но FPS залочен/ограничен до 60 [spoiler](в худшем случае 30 FPS)[/spoiler]. Вот я и попытался ограничить FPS до 120 или 60, но такой функции в настройках нету. 
Но что то я переборщил с рассказом об технической составляющей. Надо бы поговорить и об геймплее. Основные компании можно пройти на одном дыхании [spoiler](не считая секретные уровни)[/spoiler], и что бы увеличить часы в игре добавили CO - OP и Farmageddon [spoiler](местный PVP режим)[/spoiler]. На счёт CO-OP-a ничего сказать не могу, а вот о местном PVP режиме могу поговорить. Он очень схож с играми move or die или мини игры в серии игр mario party. Выбираешь сколько будет раундов, выбираешь шапку на овцу/барана и играешь рандомную мини игру. И меня удивил тот факт что добавили поддержку геймпада, и довольно хорошо её сделали.
Про визуал ничего не могу сказать кроме хороший. Но они эту игру сделали эту игру в разрешении 16:9 по сравнению с её версией в браузере. 
Эту игру я вполне могу посоветовать для своего младшего брата/сестры или своего маленького сына

review:

review:
Was für ein geniales kleines Puzzle-Spiel. Das Spiel präsentiert sich in einem wunderbaren Comiclook und die drei Schafe sind sofort ins Herz geschlossen. Dabei ist es völlig egal, ob man Fan der Serie (Shaun das Schaf) ist oder nicht, auch ohne Kenntnis der Serie macht das Ganze grossen Spass. Dazu kommen spannende und immer wieder interessant gestaltete Rätsel. Diese sind teilweise knifflig und benötigen manchmal auch ein wenig Geschick, insgesamt sind aber alle mit ein wenig nachdenken/ausprobieren gut lösbar. Hier wurde eine perfekte Mischung zwischen Herausforderung und Zugänglichkeit gefunden, wie was für dieses Genre nicht selbstverständlich ist.

Dazu kommt noch der feine Humor, den einen immer wieder zum Schmunzeln bringt. gerade hier dürften Fans der Serie erst Recht Freude finden, aber wiederum kann man sich an den drolligen Schafen erfreuen auch ohne die Serie zu kennen. Ebenfalls sehr positiv: Das Spiel ist ideal für eine kurze 10-Minuten-Pause, wo man einfach mal ein oder zwei Levels macht und dann das Game auch wieder problemlos schliessen kann.

Fazit: Für Freunde von Puzzle-Plattformern ein absolutes muss. Tolles Rätseldesign und knuffig gemachtes Design machen es zum idealen, kleinen Pausenspiel. Und mit dem sehr moderaten Schwierigkeitsgrad ist es wirklich auch für jedermann.

Disclaimer: Diese Bewertung stammt von vor dem Redesign 2019 durch das noch ein grösserer Multiplayermodus eingefügt wurde. Dieser wurde noch nicht getestet und ist in der Bewertung nicht berücksichtigt.

review:
Home Sheep Home 2 is a puzzle platformer with a simple premise. You have 3 different sheep that all need to reach exit of a scene. One is large and heavy & can push objects, the middle one jumps high, and the small one can get through crawl spaces. You swap between them and control each individually one by one.

Puzzles themselves aren't hard. Finding & obtaining secret objects might be though. Especially that positioning the sheep one on top of other in order to reach higher places can be finicky. They tend to slide off, and by accident you can easily push others away from the positions you left them in. What might be quite hard is getting 3 stars on each level, as it requires the player to be fast enough to beat certain times. Personally I don't think puzzles and speed running meshes well.

The game itself didn't grip me for some reason. I greatly enjoy Shaun the Sheep, the TV show. I find the game visuals and overall atmosphere to be adorable. Puzzles form a story of a wild adventure the sheep are having (through locations and actions, not words). I should like this, but somehow I don’t. Most of the time playing I felt that I just want to be done with it.

There doesn't seem to be anything inherently wrong with it (or at least I can't seem to articulate it), but I don't think I can recommend it either. Maybe if you have lots of spare time, not much else to play, and are aiming at just the casual base experience.

[i]Written after beating the game with 3.7 hours played & 40 of 52 (77%) achievements earned.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198048735141', 'num_games_owned': 2348, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1663882638}
review:
Home Sheep Home is about adventures of 3 sheeps - Timmy, Shaun and Shirley, which you can know from TV and movies. Every of them is different, have some other abiblities, but they can rely on each other. In this game a player control all of them to reach a proper point in a level.

There are 3 locations with 15 levels each and 15 bonus ones. Every of them is a puzzle - overall their difficulty is not brain breaking, but they are quite demanding. Every level includes collectibles which are not always so easy to get. There is also a number of various mechanics in this game, so it is not easy to get bored with it.
Moreover there are few very interesting achievements worth checking and unlocking. They are hanged to some particular levels and make a player to overthink these locations way more significantly.

The thing that truly delighted me in this game was ist hand drawn, watercolor graphics. It looks absolutely brilliant. Every level looks completely different, there are characters and items that appears only once among whole gameplay which make the game truly unique.

As for me it is one of a kind puzzle game that allows not only to play characters you like, but also to enjoy an unusual execution of this production. I highly recommend playing it.

review:
[b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] ulepszona wersja swego czasu popularnej przygodówki przeglądarkowej, do której fani kreskówek podchodzą z wielką nostalgią.

[h1] FABUŁA [/h1]
[i]Śpijcie spokojnie, zestawienie bez większych spoilerów![/i]
Kreskówkę „Baranek Shaun” choćby z nazwy będzie kojarzyło większość osób. W niej oprócz tytułowego barana poznaliśmy Shirley — spaślaczkę oraz małego Timmy'ego — baranka, który jakiś czas później otrzymał własną kreskówkę. To właśnie z tymi trzema zwierzakami możemy doświadczyć interesującej przygody, jaką jest... jednodniowa wycieczka poza farmą. Owce bowiem chcą się wyrwać i pakują się niezauważenie do samochodu farmera, który udaje się do Londynu. Perypetie zwierzaków nie kończą się jednak na Big Benie, gdyż postanawiają spędzić trochę czasu w... kosmosie.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1287628594
Jakby nie patrzeć, [b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] wielkiej fabuły nie ma. Ot owce wsiadają do samochodu i idą wciąż przed siebie. Typowa przygodówka platformowa, nic więcej.

[h1] MECHANIKA/ROZGRYWKA [/h1]
[b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] składa się z trzech epizodów: podziemnego, Londyńskiego i pozaziemskiego. Celem gracza jest sterowanie każdą z owiec w ten sposób, aby dostać się z punktu A do punktu B, ale wbrew pozorom nie jest to takie łatwe. Każda z postaci działa inaczej i inaczej wpływa na nie fizyka świata — mamy młodego i bezsilnego Timmy'ego, wysportowanego Shauna oraz silnego i ciężkiego Shirley'ego. Co za tym idzie, nie każdy z nich musi pokonać taką samą drogę, aby dojść do celu — na każdego jest inny sposób.

A co poza tym? Po drodze trzeba zbierać... wełniane skarpetki, a oprócz tego spotkamy wiele easter eggów odnoszących się do dzisiejszych trendów — od Tardis, przez sześcienne bloki dirtu, a kończąc na szkielecie Indiany Jonesa.

[h1] OPRAWA GRAFICZNA [/h1]
Oprawa graficzna w [b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] jest przyjemna, delikatna i taka... kreskówkowa. Kolory nie męczą, wszystko dopieszczone na ostatni guzik. Mógłbym nawet powiedzieć, że jest lepiej, niż w kreskówce. Animacja poruszania się, długotrwały postój w jednym miejscu — wszystko płynne, że aż nieprawdopodobne, iż to gra flashowa.

[h1] UDŹWIĘKOWIENIE/MUZYKA [/h1]
W [b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] oprócz beczenia usłyszmy genialny soundtrack z kreskówki, który idealnie komponuje się z mechaniką gry. Nic dodać, nic ująć!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cj_FlzcDwU8
[h1] PODSUMOWANIE [/h1]
Nie ma co dłużej rozpisywać się na tym, co można tam znaleźć, a czego nie, gdyż każdy powinien odkryć to sam. Warto wspomnieć, że wersja ze Steam zawiera kilka ciekawych bonusów, których w wersji przeglądarkowej nie spotkamy. Minusów gierka raczej nie posiada, a jedynym odnalezionym przeze mnie błędem jest... porzucenie projektu przez twórców.

Tak, [b]Home Sheep Home 2[/b] nie jest aktualizowany i od kilku lat stoi w tej samej postaci. Nie można się również doczekać kolejnych części, co jednak może być spowodowane sprzedaniem praw autorskich do postaci osobom trzecim. Mimo wszystko warto wydać te kilka dolarów na tę przyjemną gierkę.

review:
Home Sheep Home 2 is a very cute little puzzle-platformer in which you help three sheep to get out of different levels. Sometimes the things you have to do are hilariously absurd: you throw your sheep in the air with dynamite, use them as jumping stones, fix the gap in the electric wire with the sheep's body... Don't worry though - no matter what you do to them, your curly heroes will end up just fine.

In total there are 45 levels plus bonus ones (which you have to unlock first); they are not particularly hard, but if you're stuck, you can use in-game hints. Puzzles have just enough variety to not become repetitive, some of them are pretty creative and, in addition to that, everything is very nicely drawn - the game looks like a picture book for children, and this style suits it well. Besides the main campaign there is a lot to unlock - the game has plenty of hidden items, achievements and a score system for those who like perfecting everything. All in all - for me Home Sheep Home 2 was fun and pleasant experience, so I'd say that, if you like puzzles, this little game is worth your time and money.

review:
2Dアクションパズルゲーム。
特徴の異なる3匹の羊を使い分けてゴールまで導く。通常ステージ45ステージ、ボーナスステージ等を含む全64ステージ。

小さい羊(Timmy)は狭いところに入ることができ、中くらいの羊(Shaun)はジャンプ力が高く、大きい羊(Shirley)は力が強く重い。これらの羊を役割分担させつつ、ときには仲間の羊を土台にして高いところへジャンプという操作をしながらパズルを解いていくアクションパズルゲームだ。
カジュアルな難易度でクリアするだけなら簡単な部類に入る。パズルも難しいものではなくヒントも用意されている。どちらかと言えばパズル性よりもアクション性の方が高いと思う。アイテムを拾いながらマップを把握して、再プレイで星3つタイムクリア目指すとちょうど良い感じだ。ボーナスステージやチャレンジ実績をクリアするには少し頭を使うが、それでもそれほど難しくはない。ただし開発者タイムを超えるのはかなり無理のある難易度だ。

程良い難易度で、詰まったとしても何度かプレイすればクリアできるような「手ごろな」達成感を得られる良いゲームだと思う。のんびりとプレイするには向いているゲームだ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040208524', 'num_games_owned': 3953, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1586041171}
review:
[h1]A flufftastic game ewe've got to play![/h1]

So, how many of you guys grew up with Wallace and Gromit? I did, and I even rewatched the original short films recently. They are just as great now as back then. Thus, you can imagine how excited I was to discover that Aardman Animations had not only made a video game, but was selling it on Steam! That, along with the adorable ingame pictures, is what led to me wishlisting Home Sheep Home 2.

Thanks to a very generous friend, I received this as a gift and played it immediately to show my gratitude. I am glad I did! It's a fantastic game for many reasons. Check below for a flock-ton of reasons to give it a try!

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]
[list][*]The graphics are cute as can be. The three sheep made me want to reach through the screen and hug them. Overall, the aestetic looks more like it is drawn than computer-designed, and it helps give Home Sheep Home 2 its unique personality.
[*]There is a simple story. The game does not need more than that. What is worth noting is the lack of dialogue. Aardman Animations has always been good at telling tales through visuals, though dialogue is used in their other works. In this case, you can understand what is going on perfectly fine in terms of story-telling despite having non-speaking sheep.
[*]The characters are great. You have three sheep: Shirley, Shaun, and Timmy. They each have their own strengths and weaknesses, which means you have to use all three to finish the levels. For instance, Shirley is able to push large objects as the biggest sheep, while Timmy can fit through small holes due to his tiny size. Shaun is the best jumper and acts as the middle ground between the other two. This means that not only do you have three characters to play as, but that they are all necessary and different from one another.
[*]In terms of controls, Home Sheep Home 2 does very well. It is easy to switch between the three sheep using the numeric keys, and you have an option to use your mouse instead. Moving with the arrow keys is no trouble, and using space to jump makes it simple to get around. There are not many controls needed, and the ones present are good.
[*]Three tutorial levels are present. They are good for getting to know the game. You can also skip past them if you don't want to bother with them. As for myself, I liked going through them.
[*]With 45 levels, all having different designs and concepts, this will keep you busy for a while. There are also 15 bonus levels that you unlock with collectibles, meaning that with the tutorial levels included, there is a total of 63 levels. The levels are grouped into three areas: the mines, London, and space. They serve as themes, but that does not mean they are identical. The change in level set-ups and tactics keeps the game fresh and fun.
[*]There is platforming, but it is primarily a puzzle game. Working out how to go through each level with the three sheep tickles the brain in just the right ways. Most solutions are not difficult to figure out, but they do require thinking. There are some levels that are trickier, and they are rewarding to figure out.
[*]Lots of collectibles are scattered throughout the levels. You can collect socks for fun, cupcakes to get "cheats" ingame, and video game controllers to open bonus levels. Some are out in the open, and others are well hidden. It's definitely worth finding them all!
[*]For those interested in speedrunning, each level has times to beat for up to three stars. There are also developer times that are insane to overcome. If you like a challenge, give those a try!
[*]Once you beat the game, you can see developer commentaries in each level. There are interesting bits of trivia, and there are funny ones. They're worth checking out.
[*]There are 52 achievements. Some are simple to get, while others will test your skills. I enjoyed them a lot. None were overly frustrating, but I also felt like I earned several rather than having them handed to me on a silver platter. Those kinds of achievements that take effort, but are not almost impossible, are the ones I prefer.
[*]This makes for a wonderful family game. Both children and adults should get several hours of enjoyment out of it. It took me over eight hours to complete everything besides all the developer time challenges. I'm sure people playing it together will get even more hours out of it. I'll probably give it a replay at some point just for fun!
[*]Wallace and Gromit fans will find homages to the films inside Home Sheep Home 2, along with several Easter eggs to different movies and series. Even more than that, Shaun fans will be thrilled to find that he is one of the three playable sheep! He looks a bit healthier than in [i]A Close Shave[/i], but his trademark grin certainly brought back fond memories for me.
[*]Almost every level has a sheep-related pun. The credits even lists two people as being responsible for them. I won't spoil them, but as much as I groaned at them, they were pretty great, and several were quite clever.[/list]

[b][u]Neutral:[/u][/b]
[list][*]None of the levels have music. There is a fanfare at entering levels, but that's the closest you'll get. I would have liked some good tunes. At the same time, looping music in puzzle games can get infuriating quickly. Having silence is probably a safer option, so I can't criticize it too much.
[*]I was sad to discover that the first Home Sheep Home is not on Steam. It is free in other locations, though, so it is at least easily accessible. I plan to give it a try sometime.
[*]There are no trading cards. I was a bit disappointed since I think they would have very cute art, but I certainly don't count it as a strike against the game.[/list]

[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b]
[list][*]There are two levels where dynamite has to be used to launch the sheep to the end of the level. One of these is fairly painless. The other has some physics that I found very difficult to deal with. That one level was the worst part of the game for me. Thankfully it was only one level, so I can easily overlook that.
[*]A lot of the bonus levels are a previous level with a small change. That small change requires different tactics to complete the level. While I found those interesting, I would have preferred more that were completely new levels. There are some, but I did want more.
[*]You can get yourself trapped and be stuck for good. Fortunately, the level will restart automatically if that happens, and it can be manually restarted without a hitch. This did happen to me once, though. Some rock physics went wonky and stuck poor Shaun into the boulder and ground. I wouldn't call it an outright glitch, but it was a slip-up that probably shouldn't have happened.[/list]

[b]Overall experience:[/b]

I had a blast with Home Sheep Home 2! It's a charming game that is fun for players of all ages. $9.99 is a fair full price. Anything lower is a baaa-rgain! Whether you have seen the movies from Aardman Animations or not, it is worth playing this. Maybe it will even convince you to check out their other works!

[b]Rating:[/b]

9.5/10. Honestly, I can't see any reason to give it lower than that. There are so many great things about Home Sheep Home 2 with so few flaws, and that means it really earns its high score. I highly recommend this bleatiful game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198113497432', 'num_games_owned': 5894, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1450372105}
review:
[h1]Is it ok to support a game you could play for free?[/h1]
Getting this out of the way, Yes, this game can be found for free, almost in its entirety, that is if you don't get frustrated looking for the 3 separate chapters.

[b]Gameplay:[/b]
Shaun The sheep is a charming show, so its good to know Home Sheep Home is more than just a stripped-down puzzle, featuring Shaun.
Its a decent game regardless of its association with the show.
The game is divided in 3 Chapters, all of them focused around the three sheep specific abilities

[list]
[*] Shaun: is the middle ground character, aside from jumping higher than the other sheep, he can support some weight but not to much, he is tall but not too tall and he can push medium sized objects.
[*] Timmy: is small, he can't support weight or jump high, but he can fit through small spaces.
[*] shirley: is the heavy character, her job is to move the heavier blocks as well as helping others reaching higher platforms
[/list]

The game is divided into 3 chapters
The difficulty is decent enough, at least for chapter 1 and 3, but if you are looking for a challenge, this isn't it.
You could find some enjoyment going after specific achievements, finding hidden objects as well as going after the developers time, but the puzzles themselves won't leave you scratching your head

[list]
[*]Chapter 1 - Underground
These levels are all about logic
Some hidden collectibles that present with something closer to a challenge as well as rewarding you with references, that range from Indiana Jones to what i think if my memory doesn't fail me, is Manic Miner, some of these items will even grant you with bonus levels.
[*]Chapter 2 - Lost in London
Is the easiest of the bunch, but also introduces some sort of story line closer to what you would expect from the show.
For the most part, these aren't exactly puzzles, it revolves around simple physics and timing your jumps.
"piece of cake" really. You would have to be really young to get some enjoyment out of these levels.
There's also less items to collect and less bonus levels
[*]Chapter 3 - Lost in space
More of a return to what makes the first chapter good
with more hidden items, more references and bonus levels, which all together gives you something closer to a challenge than the previous chapter.
this chapter is mostly about teleport swaps.
[/list]

[b]My initial question was rhetorical, ofc you should support this game, its clever, its funny and it provides a decent challenge.

This was a great discovery and experience! The three sheeps Shaun, Timmy and Shirly, each with own abilities (strong and fat - small - thin and elegant), go through 3 different environments (Underground, London, Space) in varying types of puzzles. The positive thing is that there is no given solution, more are often possible. The puzzles are not too difficult until the last levels, the backgrounds are wonderfully illustrated in the style of the movies, and if you are stuck are helping system avoids too much a frustration.
There are lots of achievements and collectables and together with the puzzles there is a brilliant gaming flow created.
Some info concerning the free flash version: the Steam one has 2/3 more levels + 15 Bonuslevels, HD sound and graphics, so no way to complain to have 9 hours fun for 10 bucks (the replay value is really poor, especially if one has achieved all the goals). Besides this there are no trading cards.

review:
Хм. Ну что сказать... далеко пошли от пластилинового мульта! Я, конечно, не цинитель головоломок, но эту столило отметить.
  В этой игре Вам предстоит играть за трёх милых овец  — это Шон, Ширли и Тимми. Шон — самый ловкий, средней силы, умеет плавать. Ширли — самый медленный и не умеет плавать, но самый сильный. Тимми — самый маленький и проворный, может быть там, где другие овцы не пролезут, умеет плавать. Нужно так умно управлять этой командой, чтобы все трое оказались у финиша (у стрелочки). Вам придётся двигать предметы, плавать, нажимать на кнопки, прыгать по трубам, камням и планетам, и ещё много всего! Но главная цель — вернуться всем овечкам домой.
  В игре есть три локации: Подземелье, Лондон и Космос. У каждой из них свои особенности. В Подземелье Вы будете прыгать по камням, ловить парашюты и в итоге Вы пролетите через всю Землю и окажитесь… в Австралии. В Англии Вам надо будет незаметно пробраться в автомобиль фермера и прогуляться по достопримечательностям Лондона. И в конце, практически случайно Вы попадёте на космический корабль — там Вы повстречаете инопланетян и узнаете секрет порталов.
  Не буду раскрывать все карты, но скажу, что вам предстоит собрать кучу носков и пироженок! Бонусные уровни присутствуют.
  + Хорошая графика.
  + Головоломки интересные, не навязываются.
  + Соответствие мульту "Барашек Шон" (герои, кстати, оттуда)
  - мало уровней.
  - лагающий движок (местами, не везде)
Игре не поднимается палец поставить оценку ниже максимума - ну мило же!
10 носков из 10.

review: Surprisingly fun little game. It is a puzzle game, which I usually don't like, but after having played a crappy one (logigun) that did everything the wrong way, this game got it right. The art and music were nice. There was not really a story but that's not a big deal. The humor was good. It was nice how each sheep has its own abilities, you'll start to get to know them for that and develp a favorite. It is also cool how each one makes its own sound. Unlike that crap logigun game, the puzzles are well done. Instead of a giant room with 12 switches, 15 moveable boxes, 10 lazers, and only 1 single solution the creators made so you have to figure out the exact order they want you to do it so you can beat the level, which takes 30 minutes of looking and isn't intuitive, this game is the opposite. The puzzles are clever, require reasoning and logic, and can actually be solved multiple ways (some of them). Once again, as opposed to the logigun game, you are not in just a single boring looking nondescript room, each level has different setting and objectives and you operate different machinery, so it actually feels like the puzzles has a purpose instead of just "open final door". There are 3 episodes which are each differently themed. The variety kept everything interesting, and it wasn't just stupidly over hard for the sake of being so (logigun......sorry I just played the game right before this so I am drawing all my comparisons). The game was kind of short though and I guess you can play a similar version online for free on a flash website. 7/10

非常有趣的解謎小品遊戲！

基本上目的是要把大、中、小三隻羊都送到出口來過關，中間必須不斷切換利用到每隻羊的特性互相幫助以發揮最大效率：例如大隻羊是唯一在水中會下沉的、中羊可跳躍最高，常擔任機動性角色、小羊體型最不受限，可走其他羊走不了的小路。

這是一款很可愛、玩起來很舒服的解謎遊戲，成就也不難取得，推薦給puzzle game lover!~ \=w=/

Three sheep, a long exciting journey, 3 different episodes, one hundred of stuff to collect, 15 serect levels, 180 stars to beat and more interesting achievements to explore. This game is both for children and adults, not hard to play but quite creative. I also appreciate its art style and music. For achivement hunters, I should say the prefection takes you 5 hours, but definitely worthy.

这是一部上上品的独立解密游戏，在这里我强烈推荐。里面讲述了3只羊的冒险故事，故事分为背景迥异的三章，很多元素等待你去收集（故事情节相关而且不变态），每关3颗星（比较简单），还有15个隐藏关卡。一些有意思的成就是让你用些别样的方式来通关。这些特点在一起使得这款游戏非常具有创造性，但是并没有使游戏过于困难。游戏的画面风格和音乐也不错哦。对于成就党来说，这个游戏只需花你5个小时，但是绝对超值。

review:
Home Sheep Home 2 is a nice little puzzle game featuring the sheeps from "Shaun the Sheep".
The goal of the game is to finish little levels with your three sheeps, each one has different skills:
-Timmy, the little one, can get through small holes to get to buttons etc.
-Shirley, the big one, can move heavy objects.
-Shaun can jump highest of all three, so he can reach platforms, which are out of reach for the others.
Mostly you have to combine the skills of all three to get them all to the exit. 
There are only a few levels, where the skills doesn't matter at all.
In general the levels aren't that hard, but the "Lost in Space"-chapter has some levels, which can be tricky to figure out or have some tricky platforming part.
The only negative point I can think of is that the last levels of the "Lost in Space"-chapter has some control problems(they invert sometimes, but I haven't figured out why), but they aren't that bad and doesn't influence the flow that much.
So all in all I would recommend this game to all people, who like a nice little puzzle platformer with not so hard puzzles.
